name: jQueryMessageBox
tagline: A jQuery plugin to create configurable status message boxes
body:
A simple jQuery plugin to show up configurable CSS3 compliant messageboxes in a webpage.

Requires jQuery v1.4 or greater.

***
Usage:
$.jQueryMessageBox(options);

options is an associative array of properties like type, behavior, title, text etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
